metadata.title: CVE-2022-24106 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Xpdf prior to 4.04, the DCT (JPEG) decoder was incorrectly allowing the'interleaved' flag to be changed after the first scan of the image, leadingto an unknown integer-related vulnerability in Stream.cc.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
emscripten: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
